thread.title: Emma Roberts gets ‘dream’ girl-friends on ‘Scream Queens’ sets
thread.title_full: Emma Roberts gets ‘dream’ girl-friends on ‘Scream Queens’ sets | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Emma Roberts gets ‘dream’ girl-friends on ‘Scream Queens’ sets
text:
Other Articles Study sheds light on culinary habits of Stonehenge builders 'Fantasy Island' to get reboot with female protagonist Leonardo DiCaprio to make movie on Volkswagen scandal Though everyone believes that more than two girls end up having a cat fight, yet Emma Roberts revealed that she and her horror-comedy series’ female co-stars have no drama in real life with each other instead are good friends.
However, Ariana Grande, Lea Michele, Abigail Breslin, Keke Palmer and Billie Lourd play the role of Roberts’ sorority sisters on the American hit series.
The ‘Scream Queens’ star, who will grace Teen Vogue’s November cover, said that the stars always text each other, eat together and have fun that it never feels she’s going for her work, E! Online reported.
The 24-year-old American actress added that having a tight-knit group of friends hasn’t always been easy for her because when she was a teenager she had lot of friends, but they were full drama and bitchiness.
 15, 2015 12:20 am
